label: combinedProductionDevice
comment: A production device combined with this production machine.

rangeIncludes.comment: An object, especially a piece of mechanical or electronic equipment, made or adapted in order to perform a production activity.

domainIncludes.comment: An apparatus specified to be used to perform an activity to produce something.
